title: Graduate College Fellowship and Award Deadlines | Graduate College | University of Illinois at Chicago
text: Round I – Recruitment only
Department nominations due to the Graduate College: February 3, 2020
Announcement of awards: February 26, 2020
Last day for awardees to inform Graduate College of acceptance: April 15, 2020
Round II – Retention
Department nominations due to the Graduate College: April 1, 2020
Announcement of awards: April 24, 2020
Program/Department nominations due to the Graduate College: October 25, 2019
Announcement of awards: December 2, 2019
Fall 2019
Applications/Department nominations due to the Graduate College: October 18, 2019
Announcement of awards: December 2, 2019
Spring 2020
Applications/Department nominations due to the Graduate College: March 20, 2020
Announcement of awards: April 20, 2020
Department nominations due to the Graduate College: March 13, 2020
Announcement of awards: April 20, 2020
Last day for awardees to inform Graduate College of acceptance: June 1, 2020
The 2020 deadline has been extended from March 1 to March 6 (4PM).
Winners will be announced around April 20, 2020

Student submits completed application and related documents to their degree program. Contact your degree program for their deadline and instructions (program will need sufficient time to review and process before their submission date listed below)
Director of Graduate Studies uploads application and related documents via the Graduate College website: March 20, 2020  EXTENDED TO APRIL 1, 2020
Announcement of Awards: April 20, 2020

Student submits completed application and related documents to their degree program. Contact your degree program for their deadline and instructions (program will need sufficient time to review and process before their submission date listed below)
Director of Graduate Studies uploads application and related documents via the Graduate College website (under For Faculty/Staff, access restricted): October 14 2019
Announcement of Awards: December 2, 2019.
The candidate formally applies to UIC and their SROP mentor submits a nomination to the graduate program Director of Graduate Studies (DGS) by December 15, 2019.
Nominees for the Access (Recruitment) Fellowship and University Fellowships are automatically considered for the PIF.
Department nominations due to the Graduate College: February 3, 2020
Announcement of awards: February 26, 2020
Last day for awardees to inform Graduate College of acceptance: April 15, 2020
